comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.bloomberg.com/live/asia](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bloomberg.com%2Flive%2Fasia) ### Comment > I noticed that when AdGuard Ad Blocker, AdGuard for Windows, and AdGuard Browser extension are running, I am unable to play any videos on Bloomberg. However, the issue resolves once I disable these AdGuard applications. I believe the issue is caused by the AdGuard series of software. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ejyuzin5tlc84w8ggocso8woswows8g2zz9cy9rrgs.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ch0zdmvza1c8sskc08kokgs048cko8cq7eqycjamhw.jpg?nc=1)
